Nerangs.ab: pas yaϑā ahū vairiiō do goftan yasnəmca OD āfrīnāmi aiβiiō vaŋhibiiō vīspanąmca apąm mazdaδātanąm bərəzatō ahurahe nafəδrō apąm apasca mazdaδātaiiā̊ va yek sokure-ye zarr az dast-e čab-e māhruy be-nahešn

"Then, he should recite two yaϑā ahū vairiiō and yasnəmca until āfrīnāmi aiβiiō vaŋhibiiō vīspanąmca apąm mazdaδātanąm bərəzatō ahurahe nafəδrō apąm apasca mazdaδātaiiā̊ and he should place a golden cup to the left side of the māhruy."
yaϑā ahū vairiiō do goftan yasnəmca v. aō. z. ā. tā ō ʿe ahurāne ahurahe
"Then, he should recite two yaϑā ahū vairiiō and yasnəmca v. aō. z. ā. until ahurāne ahurahe."
